name: Hannah Stevenson
description: I, Hannah am self-taught and baked from home on the side of full time jobs from April 2018 before taking the plunge and becoming fully self-employed in January 2020. I struggled to keep up with demand so rented a unit to bake from and it has all went from there.

name: Adam Stevenson
description: Hi, I'm Adam, Hannah's husband. I work alongside Hannah in the shop preparing cookies and getting the shop ready for business everyday. I graduated in Business from Ulster University so that means I get to do sort out all the business side of things as well in our office based at the unit (where we bake all our products minus cakes and cupcake).

name: Rachel Graham
description: Hi, I'm Rachel, Hannah's younger sister. I work in the shop, serving customers and organising the counter. I'm also a classroom assistant in a primary school.

name: Aoife Browne
description: Hi, I'm Aoife.  I started working in Piece of Cake in July and I love serving customers delicious treats. I am currently in university in Belfast studying microbiology.

name: Susan Graham
description: Hi, I'm Susan, Hannah and Rachel's mum. I work in the bakery, baking and creating the delicous bakes sold on the counter. I also help out in the shop on Saturday mornings.

name: Jackie Crawford
description: Hi, I'm Jackie, Susan's twin sister! I also work in the bakery alongside Susan getting all the stock ready for the week so it can be sold in the shop.

name: Sarah Crawford
description: Hi, I'm Sarah, Hannah's cousin! I work in the shop serving customers bakes, hot drinks and ice-cream.  I also have my own business, making and selling wax melts when I'm not working in Piece of Cake.

name: Reanna Rice
description: Hi, I'm Reanna.  I work in the shop at the weekends, baking cupcakes and serving customers. I'm also a singer and am currently doing my AS Levels.
